content.rendered:

There are a great number of fully funded International scholarships for students studying Bachelor, Master, and PhD programs across the world to study abroad. This page will provide you with many international scholarships, fully funded for international studies, covering tuition fees, monthly stipends, Health insurance, flight tickets, research allowances, conference attendance fees and lots more.

Deadline: December 2024

SBW Berlin Scholarships for International Students

  • Program Level: Undergraduate, Masters.
  • Deadline: December 31, 2024

 

Are you from a family-disadvantage background and want support to study undergraduate Masters programs? Apply for the SBW Berlin scholarships, which support young people from abroad with financially disadvantaged backgrounds.

Click here to read more.

Deadline: January 2024

Scholarships with January 2024 deadlines are given below;

OSCE Academy in Bishkek Scholarship

  • Program Level: Masters.
  • Deadline: January 10, 2024

The Scholarship is fully financed (full tuition fee waiver, month-to-month allowance, full circle travel to Bishkek, Medical insurance, and so forth) and granted to qualified candidates who are applying to concentrate on one of the Master’s of Art programs (MA in Politics and Security Program and the MA in Economic Governance and Development Program) of the Foundation. The scholarship program helps chosen candidates chase after their instructive objectives.

To apply for the scholarship, Read the eligibility checks here

Belgium Government Scholarship, Europe

  • Programs: Short Course, Undergraduate & Masters
  • Application Deadline: January 27, 2024

The scholarship program offers students a chance to pursue a one-year advanced Bachelor’s or Master’s degree program or a 2-to-6-month continuing education Program within a higher education institution of the Wallonia-Brussels Federation in Belgium. Developing countries with professional experience looking to develop their skills in a development-related field can apply.

To apply, click here.

Queen Elizabeth Commonwealth Scholarship

  • Programs: Masters
  • Deadline: January 10, 2024

The Queen Elizabeth Commonwealth Scholarship program is offered to students committed to creating change in their communities. The scholarship is open for a 2-year master’s degree in the commonwealth’s low- or middle-income countries.

To apply, check eligibility here

KAIST International Student Scholarship, South Korea

  • Program Level: Masters
  • Deadline: January 13, 2024

The KAIST International Scholarship is offered by the Korean Advanced Institute of Science and Technology for international students willing to conduct their first cycle of undergraduate studies at the Institute. The scholarship is fully funded with a full tuition fee waiver, living expenses and National Health Insurance.

To apply, read the eligibility terms here

Deadline: February 2024

ANSO Scholarship for International Students

  • Program Level: Masters, PhD, Research.
  • Deadline: February 15, 2024

ANSO scholarship for Young Talents is opened for non-Chinese residents to seek postgraduate studies at universities or schools of the University of Science and Technology of China (USTC), the University of Chinese Academy of Sciences (UCAS) or institutes of CAS. The scholarship is completely subsidized and gives flight tickets, medical coverage, tuition fees and a serious month-to-month allowance. Consistently, up to 500 scholarships are given to understudies from everywhere in the world.

To Apply, follow here.

Chinese Government Scholarship at HIT

  • Level: Masters, PhD.
  • Deadline: February 18, 2024

The Scholarship is open for international students who want to study for a Master’s or PhD degree at the Harbin Institute of Technology (HIT). HIT will select and recommend the best applicants to the China Scholarship Council (CSC). The institute is a leading National University with science and engineering as its core, encompassing management, liberal arts, economy, and law.

Check Eligibility Here

Deadline: April 2024

Khalifa University Scholarships

  • Program Level: Masters, PhD.
  • Deadline: April 30, 2024

Khalifa University Scholarships are open for both National and International students, particularly provided for graduate students and cover educational expenses and attract a monthly stipend. The program will support graduate students in Medicine.

To apply, Read more here.

For more available scholarships, please bookmark and visit this page regularly to read more updated, fully funded international scholarships.
